Between December 1894 and August 1997: IBIS - Bank of Italy historical balance sheet series.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm

DATA_COMP: From June 2016 onwards: disaggregated financial statement of the Eurosystem. Between September 1997 and May 2016: the Bank of Italy balance sheet aggregates following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between December 1894 and August 1997: IBIS - Bank of Italy historical balance sheet series.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm

Between September 1997 and May 2016: the Bank of Italy balance sheet aggregates following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between December 1894 and August 1997: IBIS - Bank of Italy historical balance sheet series.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm
COMPILING_ORG: Bank of Italy; European Central Bank; Bank for International Settlements.

Between December 1894 and August 1997: IBIS - Bank of Italy historical balance sheet series.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm

DATA_COMP: From June 2016 onwards: disaggregated financial statement of the Eurosystem. Between September 1997 and May 2016: the Bank of Italy balance sheet aggregates following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between December 1894 and August 1997: IBIS - Bank of Italy historical balance sheet series.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm

Between September 1997 and May 2016: the Bank of Italy balance sheet aggregates following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between December 1894 and August 1997: IBIS - Bank of Italy historical balance sheet series.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm
COMPILING_ORG: Bank of Italy; European Central Bank; Bank for International Settlements.

Between December 1894 and August 1997: IBIS - Bank of Italy historical balance sheet series.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm

DATA_COMP: From June 2016 onwards: disaggregated financial statement of the Eurosystem. Between September 1997 and May 2016: the Bank of Italy balance sheet aggregates following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between December 1894 and August 1997: IBIS - Bank of Italy historical balance sheet series.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm

Between September 1997 and May 2016: the Bank of Italy balance sheet aggregates following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between December 1894 and August 1997: IBIS - Bank of Italy historical balance sheet series.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm
COMPILING_ORG: Bank of Italy; European Central Bank; Bank for International Settlements.
